name: Assassin
description: A killer-for-hire who lurks in the shadows, then strikes with concealed weapons drawn in an instant.
signature: You enter an area with a large bonus to Crit and Stealth, but this bonus is reduced as Zone Tension rises.

name: Brawler
description: A disciplined fighter who trains in both hand-to-hand combat and with various weapons.
signature: Each time you attack an enemy, you have a small chance to repeat that attack immediately.

name: Brute
description: A muscular thug who recognizes that his physique is his greatest asset; he uses heavy weapons.
signature: Each time you take damage, there is a moderate chance that you enter a Power Burst.

name: Dervish
description: A deadly dancer in battle who sprints between skirmishes with an unpredictable weapon.
signature: Your attacks have a small bonus to Area, and this bonus increases slowly as Zone Tension rises.

name: Duelist
description: A nimble noble who is courteous to a fault, unless dishonored… then a duel is called for.
signature: When an enemy inflicts an ailment on you, you have a moderate chance to enter a Power Burst.

name: Guardian
description: A cautious defender who prefers to use polearms and shields to keep foes at bay.
signature: You gain a small Damage, Defense, and Evasion bonus for each enemy or ally currently adjacent to you.

name: Hunter
description: A tireless tracker who stalks prey through the wild before striking with a so-called “primitive” weapon.
signature: On even-numbered rounds, you gain a moderate bonus to Precision and Evasion.

name: Jester
description: A cackling comedian who gauges his foes at a distance before hurling an arsenal of thrown weapons.
signature: On odd-numbered rounds, you have a low chance to enter a Power Burst; this chance rises as Zone Tension rises.

name: Marksman
description: A quiet, calm sniper who is skilled with all forms of projectile weaponry, and uses it to great effect.
signature: Each time an enemy moves to a cell you can attack, you have a low chance to make a reaction attack against them.

name: Swordsman
description: A humble warrior who seeks a balanced approach to mastering the blade.
signature: As Zone Tension rises, you gain a very small bonus to all stats.

name: Seer
description: A wise wielder of Mystic powers who can sense impending danger; fortune smiles on him.
signature: When you first enter an area, you gain a bonus to Luck based on how many enemies are present then.

name: Shaman
description: A protector of nature who can commune with spirits of the land to gain Primal powers.
signature: You recover from ailments in half the time it normally takes.

name: Priest
description: A devoted servant of a god who gains Blessed power through prayer and the support of a church.
signature: When an enemy inflicts an ailment on you, you gain a moderate bonus to Damage and Defense.

name: Diabolist
description: A rogue magician who seeks out Occult power everywhere he can, signing deals with devils regularly.
signature: You enter an area with a small penalty to Influence and Crit that becomes a large bonus as Zone Tension rises.

name: Wizard
description: A learned sage who has studied magic deeply, evoking Arcane powers with gestures and words.
signature: You have a moderate chance to halve all bonuses on enemies you hit, but this chance shrinks as Zone Tension rises.
A Power Burst is a 2-turn period where a character has doubled Precision, Damage, Crit, and Influence.
Each area has a Zone Tension score that rises with each attack an NPC makes; various abilities rely on this.
